timeframe.monthlyDescription: Simple monthly budgeting, one month at a time

strategy.title: How do you plan?
strategy.subtitle: Choose your budgeting strategy for the year
strategy.equalDescription: Same amount every month, simple & predictable
strategy.seasonalDetail: Great for expenses that change with seasons
strategy.customDescription: Set each month individually, maximum control
strategy.customDetail: Full flexibility for unique planning needs
strategy.infoText: Don't worry, you can change this later in settings

categories.subtitle: Choose what you want to track and budget for

allocation.validationError: Please allocate the full budget before continuing

savings.title: What happens to savings?
savings.subtitle: Decide how to handle money saved under budget
savings.mainDescription: Include budget savings in monthly settlement
savings.explanationText: When you spend less than your budget, the savings are split equally between both partners in the settlement calculation.
savings.secondaryDescription: This option lets you track budget vs. spending without including savings in settlements. Good for couples who handle leftover money differently.
savings.infoText: You can change this setting anytime in budget preferences

success.title: Your Budget is Ready!
success.subtitle: You're all set to start tracking and managing your shared finances
